__e: Find Mr. Drake and tell him I must see him, if only for a moment.
I want the Drake, and you're going to hand it over to me, or I'm going to--
Listen to me, Mr. Drake is a good friend of mine ...
YOU HAVE NO IDEA WHAT DRAKE'S CAPABLE OF.

I'm aware that your work is more important than Drake's murder or who did it and frankly I'd rather not be here either but should Drake's life not matter because he was less of a man than the men you're treating?
Mr. Drake is a very busy, very important man.
While I have you, Mr. Drake is on his way over.
Like I said, Drake's busy, but I'm here.
But if Drake's there, you should talk to him.
You have made an excellent beginning, Mr. Drake, I should not like to think that we have been mistaken on you too.
Ms. Drake had nothing to do with this.
If Mr. Drake is not here to do so, then I shall.
